description: When the kids are craving something sweet, whip us these cafe-worthy filo plum tarts. They're nutritionally approved and are on the table in 30 minutes.
name: Filo Plum Tarts Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 small plums, halved, destoned, thinly sliced into wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place 1 pastry sheet on workbench. Spray with oil. Top with a second sheet.
Fold in half crossways. Fold over 4 edges to create a pastry shell. Repeat with remaining pastry and oil to make 4 pastry shells.
Combine ricotta, honey, vanilla and cinnamon in a medium bowl. Divide ricotta mixture evenly among centre of pastry shells.
Arrange plum, slightly overlapping, over ricotta. Bake for 15 minutes or until pastry is golden and crisp. Serve.
